name: Nikhil Praveen
title: Software Developer at UST
about: Software Developer trained in developing and deploying Microservices-based applications using ASP.NET Core Web API, .NET MVC, MS SQL Server, and Angular. Proficient in containerization, Azure deployment, and database management. Passionate about building intelligent, scalable, and responsive web applications.

projects.title: Fake News Detection Website
projects.description: Created a system to identify fake news leveraging Domain Adversarial Neural Network (DANN) for improved accuracy. Utilized TensorFlow and Keras for model training, and implemented the system with a Next.js frontend and Flask backend.

projects.title: SecureMind
projects.description: Developed a website that allows users to anonymously report crime incidents, raising awareness and facilitating access to mental health support. Built using Angular, .NET, and Microsoft SQL Server.

projects.title: Resume Parser
projects.description: Developed a resume parsing and PDF generation application using FastAPI and React, enabling users to upload resumes, extract structured data, and generate clean PDF versions. Integrated authentication with JWT, DSPy, and Azure OpenAI for intelligent text summarization.

experience.details: Trained in developing and deploying Microservices-based applications using ASP.NET Core Web API, .NET MVC, MS SQL Server, and Angular. Experienced with containerization and Azure deployment.
Trained in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to design responsive websites. Experienced in integrating public APIs for data display.
Trained in basics of machine learning using scikit-learn, Keras, and PyTorch.

education.institution: Mar Athanasius College of Engineering, Kothamangalam
